noGamerTag: {{pCross}} You need to provide a username to check statistics. You can save a default by using the flag `--save` with this command.
notFound: {{pCross}} I could not find a user corresponding to that user, please try a different one.
statsNotFound: {{pCross}} No statistical data could be found for that username, please try a different one.

osu.description: Get statistics of players from osu! the game.
osu.detailedDescription: You need to provide an osu! username of a player to use this command (i.e. p!osu www). To save a default profile, use the --save flag with this command (i.e. p!osu www --save).

fortnite.description: Get statistics of players from Fortnite.
fortnite.detailedDescription: You need to provide an Epic Games username of a player to use this command (i.e. p!fortnite Ninja). To save a default profile, use the --save flag with this command (i.e. p!fortnite Ninja --save).

csgo.description: Get statistics of players from Counter Strike: Global Offensive.
csgo.detailedDescription: You need to provide a steam username of a player to use this command (i.e. p!csgo Guardian). To save a default profile, use the --save flag with this command (i.e. p!csgo Guardian --save).

coc.description: Get statistics of players from Clash of Clans.
coc.detailedDescription: You need to provide a player tag while using this command (i.e. p!coc #8GQPJG2CL). To save a default profile, use the --save flag with this command (i.e. p!coc #8GQPJG2CL --save).
